title: Chapter 1610 - Notes On Demon Hunting
body:
Chapter 1610 - Notes On Demon Hunting

There was a starkly different corpse!

Its bones were tinged dark silver, and they were extremely thick. There was a flame-shaped marking on its head.

The Soul Flame Bone Marking!

This was an innate characteristic of Formless Demons.

There are nine Demon Law Rings in the Soul Flame Bone Marking. This guy was a Demon Noble! Su Yiâ€™s brow furrowed.

The demons of the Beyond had experts comparable to those of the Immortal Dao. They could be roughly divided into four levels: Demon Captains, Demon Generals, Demon Nobles, and Demon Kings.

These levels corresponded to Universe Realm Immortals, Void Realm True Immortals, Saint Realm Immortal Lords, and Miracle Realm Immortal Kings.

This corpse belonged to a Formless Demon, one of the nine great demon races of the beyond. Its Soul Flame Bone Marking had nine layers of round Demon Law Rings, which meant it was a Demon Noble, an expert comparable to an Immortal Lord!

And Formless Demons were crafty and insidious. They were natural assassins who excelled at transformations and catching people off guard.

Demons of the Beyond invaded the Academy of Eternal Night during the Age of Fallen...
